actionable_tasks.title: Persist Rolling Window Metrics to Redis
actionable_tasks.description: Implement logic to persist API latency and error metrics in a rolling window to Redis for durability and multi-instance aggregation. This will improve reliability and scalability of performance monitoring.
implementation_steps: Add Redis connection logic in src/config/redis.js.
Update metrics middleware to write rolling window data to Redis after each request.
Modify scripts/bench/api-latency.js to read/write metrics from Redis for aggregation.
Test with local Redis instance to verify durability and multi-instance support.

actionable_tasks.title: TypeScript Migration Plan for High-Change Backend Modules
actionable_tasks.description: Draft and begin implementing a migration plan to convert backend modules with high change-rate (e.g., src/api/routes/*, src/chat/*) from JavaScript to TypeScript. Start with type annotations and basic type safety.
implementation_steps: Create a migration checklist for each target file.
Rename .js files to .ts and add basic type annotations.
Update imports/exports for TypeScript compatibility.
Run typecheck and fix any immediate errors.
Document migration status in WORKFLOW_STATE.md.

actionable_tasks.title: Containerize Node Backend with Simple Dockerfile
actionable_tasks.description: Create a basic Dockerfile for the Node backend service to enable containerized development and deployment. No external dependencies beyond Docker required.
implementation_steps: Write Dockerfile for Node backend (FROM node:XX, COPY, RUN npm install, CMD).
Add service definition to docker-compose.yml for local dev.
Test build and run locally to verify containerization.
Update documentation with usage instructions.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Jest Integration/Security Tests for MCP Endpoints

implementation_steps: Identify MCP endpoints and provider health routes.

Run test suite and ensure coverage increases.
Document new tests in WORKFLOW_STATE.md.
